head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RE, RITA JOYCE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RE, RITA JOYCE

block.p: RE--Rita Joyce, on June 4, 2007. Beloved wife of the late Thomas J. Re. Loving mother of Sarina Shanahan and the late Charles T. Re. Fond mother-in-law of Thomas J. Shanahan. Cherished grandmother of Christin Brecher and Mark Shanahan, and great-grandmother of Thomas and Carley Brecher. Funeral services were private.

RE--Rita Joyce, on June 4, 2007. Beloved wife of the late Thomas J. Re. Loving mother of Sarina Shanahan and the late Charles T. Re. Fond mother-in-law of Thomas J. Shanahan. Cherished grandmother of Christin Brecher and Mark Shanahan, and great-grandmother of Thomas and Carley Brecher. Funeral services were private.
